00126         //===========================================================================
00164         virtual void modelDerivative(const Array<double>& input, Array<double>& derivative)
00165         {
00166                 double old;
00167                 int p, pc = parameter.dim(0);
00168                 Array<double> output;
00169                 Array<double> perturbed_output;
00170                 model(input, output);
00171                 int o, oc = output.dim(0);
00172                 derivative.resize(oc, pc, false);
00173                 for (p=0; p<pc; p++)
00174                 {
00175                         old = parameter(p);
00176                         parameter(p) += epsilon;
00177                         model(input, perturbed_output);
00178                         for (o=0; o<oc; o++)
00179                         {
00180                                 derivative(o, p) = (perturbed_output(o) - output(o)) / epsilon;
00181                         }
00182                         parameter(p) = old;
00183                 }
00184         }
00185 
00187         void modelDerivative(const Array<double>& input, Array<double>& derivative) const
00188         {
00189                 Model* pT = const_cast<Model*>(this);
00190                 return pT->modelDerivative(input, derivative);
00191         }

00297         virtual void generalDerivative(const Array<double>& input, const Array<double>& coefficient, Array<double>& derivative)
00298         {
00299                 Array<double> md;
00300                 modelDerivative(input, md);
00301 
00302                 int i, ic = getOutputDimension();
00303                 int j, jc = getParameterDimension();
00304 
00305                 derivative.resize(jc, false);
00306 
00307                 for (j=0; j<jc; j++)
00308                 {
00309                         double td = 0.0;
00310                         for (i=0; i<ic; i++)
00311                         {
00312                                 td += coefficient(i) * md(i, j);
00313                         }
00314                         derivative(j) = td;
00315                 }
00316         }
00317

00439         friend inline std::istream& operator >> (std::istream& is, Model& model)
00440         {
00441                 char c;
00442                 double value;
00443                 std::vector<double> v;
00444                 int p, pc;
00445                 while (true)
00446                 {
00447                         is >> value;
00448                         v.push_back(value);
00449                         is.read(&c, 1);
00450                         if (c == '\r')
00451                         {
00452                                 is.read(&c, 1);
00453                                 if (! is.good() || c != '\n') throw "[Model::operator >>] invalid data format";
00454                                 break;
00455                         }
00456                         if (! is.good() || c != ' ') throw "[Model::operator >>] invalid data format";
00457                 }
00458                 pc = v.size();
00459                 model.parameter.resize(pc, false);
00460                 for (p=0; p<pc; p++) model.setParameter(p, v[p]);
00461                 return is;
00462         }

00474         friend inline std::ostream& operator << (std::ostream& os, const Model& model)
00475         {
00476                 int p, pc = model.parameter.dim(0);
00477                 char buffer[50];
00478                 for (p=0; p<pc; p++)
00479                 {
00480                         if (p != 0) os.write(" ", 1);
00481                         sprintf(buffer, "%.15g", model.parameter(p));
00482                         os.write(buffer, strlen(buffer));
00483                 }
00484                 os.write("\r\n", 2);
00485                 return os;
00486         }
